name: Haruna
acquisitionMethod: Available in Point Shop in event "Ink-Stained Steel Sakura"

1.name: Default
1.description: Third ship of the Kongou class fast battleships, Haruna.

limitBreak.tier1: Main Gun Mount +1 / Main Gun Efficiency +5%
limitBreak.tier2: Secondary Gun Mount +2 / Main Gun Efficiency +10%
limitBreak.tier3: Main Gun Mount +1 / Main Gun Efficiency +15%

1.name: Warship of the Dawn's Radiance
1.description: Every time the main gun is fired, increases own firepower and AA by 1.5% (6%). Can be stacked up to 4 times.

1.chinese: 金刚级高速战舰三番舰—榛名
1.chineseTL: Third ship of the Kongou class fast battleships, Haruna.
1.japanese: 金剛型高速戦艦三番艦・榛名
1.japaneseTL: Third ship of the Kongou-class Fast Battleships, Haruna.

2.chinese: 重樱航速最快的，同时也是唯一一艘直到最后都在奋战的高速战舰——武勋舰榛名。这一次，我也会——努力尽情尽力地战斗！
2.chineseTL: I am the fastest, and the only fast battleship that fought til the very end, decorated battleship Haruna. This time, I will also fight with everything I have!
2.japanese: 重桜高速戦艦最速にして、最後まで奮戦した金剛型三番艦・榛名。今回も――全身全霊、全力で戦ってみせる！
2.japaneseTL: I am Haruna, the third ship of the Kongou-class and the fastest of the Sakura Empire battleships. This time too, I'll fight to the end with all my spirit and might!

3.chinese: 初次见面，我是重樱首艘高速战舰——榛名。指挥官，比起刀剑，我更喜欢拳头唷
3.chineseTL: Nice to meet you, I am the first Sakura Empire fast battleship , Haruna. Commander, I actually prefer fists over swords.
3.japanese: 初めまして、重桜初の高速戦艦・榛名と言います。刀より拳を好む性分ですが、何卒よろしく
3.japaneseTL: Hello, I am Haruna, one of the first fast battleships of the Sakura Empire. I'm someone who prefers the fist to the sword. Nice to meet you.

4.chinese: 这么爽朗的天气，不出海实在太可惜了，对吧，指挥官
4.chineseTL: Such great weather, isn't it a waste to not sail out today? Right, commander?
4.japanese: いい天気だよね。「せっかくの晴天なんだから出航すればよかった」なんてことにならない方がいいよ。指揮官もそう思うよね？
4.japaneseTL: The weather is good today, though I would not prefer leaving the dock because "it would be a shame not to with such fine weather." Don't you agree, Commander?

5.chinese: 我也…想像雾岛那样受人欢迎呢…
5.chineseTL: I also...want to be as popular as Kirishima...
5.japanese: 私も霧島みたいな人気者になりたい……かな……
5.japaneseTL: I guess I also want to become someone popular like Kirishima.

6.chinese: 终于有能和威尔士以拳交心的机会了！
6.chineseTL: I finally got the chance to exchange blows with Wales!
6.japanese: ようやく…ようやくウェールズと戦える…！
6.japaneseTL: Finally, finally I can fight against Wales!

7.chinese: 指挥官，没有勇气和毅力战胜不了的敌人，你也是这么认为的吧？
7.chineseTL: Commander, without perseverance and courage it's impossible to triumph over your enemies, don't you think so as well?
7.japanese: 勇気と根性で勝てない相手なんていないよ。指揮官もそう思わない？
7.japaneseTL: There are no insurmountable opponents with bravery and determination. Don't you agree, Commander?

8.chinese: 牛肉果然还是上州的最好——指挥官，你也尝尝吧？
8.chineseTL: When it comes to beef, it has to be Joushuu...commander, come try it as well.
8.japanese: 牛肉と言えば上州牛よね。指揮官も食べてみる？
8.japaneseTL: Speaking of beef, I recommend Joshu beef. Would Commander also want to try some?

9.chinese: 指挥官，你也喜欢吃比叡姐做的大福吗？
9.chineseTL: Commander, do you also like to eat Hiei's Daifuku?
9.japanese: 比叡さんの作った和三盆……指揮官も好き？
9.japaneseTL: Do you like the sugar sweets Hiei made, too?

10.chinese: 咦？带上手套，就不容易弄脏手了呀
10.chineseTL: Eh, the gloves? It's to prevent my hand from getting dirty when hitting you.
10.japanese: は！……手袋をしていれば、今度殴る時に手を汚さずに済ませられそうね
10.japaneseTL: Ha! If I wore gloves, I won't have to dirty my hands hitting you next time.

11.chinese: 比叡姐，一起去活动活动筋骨怎么样？
11.chineseTL: Hiei, let's go exercise a little, shall we?
11.japanese: 比叡さん、一緒に体を動かしてみない？
11.japaneseTL: Hiei, want to go get some exercise?

12.chinese: 金刚姐，我也算能独当一面了吧？
12.chineseTL: Kongou, I am independent enough now.
12.japanese: 金剛姉さん、私はもう一人前ですよ？
12.japaneseTL: Big sis Kongou, I'm already grown-up, you know?

13.chinese: 我很喜欢你的嗓音，所以——能念给我听吗？
13.chineseTL: I really like your voice,so...could you read it for me?
13.japanese: 指揮官の声が好き。だから――読んでもらえないかな？
13.japaneseTL: I like hearing your voice, so won't you read it to me?

14.chineseTL: Good work, did you encounter any enemies?
14.japanese: お疲れ様。敵に会ったりした？
14.japaneseTL: Good work. Did you see any enemies?

15.chineseTL: Eh, it's still not my turn yet?
15.japaneseTL: Alright, it's time for me...eh, not yet?

18.japanese: 金剛姉さん！ご褒美が欲しいです！
18.japaneseTL: Big sis Kongou! I want a reward!

19.chinese: 咕……很抱歉，但输了就是输了——
19.chineseTL: Ke...I am very sorry, but a loss is a loss...
19.japanese: くっ……ごめんなさい…でも、負けは負けだよね…
19.japaneseTL: Ugh, I'm sorry. But a loss is a loss.

21.japanese: まだ終わりじゃないよ！

23.chinese: 金刚姐，我来帮你揉揉肩吧
23.chineseTL: Kongou, let me give you a massage.
23.japanese: 金剛姉さん、肩を揉ませてください
23.japaneseTL: Big sis Kongou, let me massage your shoulders.

24.chinese: 激战之后，就应该吃一桶热腾腾的大米饭呢
24.chineseTL: After an intense battle, having a pot of piping hot rice is the way to go.
24.japanese: 激戦のあとはバケツ盛り白ご飯が食べたくなるね
24.japaneseTL: A fierce battle makes me want to eat a bucket full of rice afterwards.

25.chinese: 指挥官，你也会跳舞吗？嗯…那个——能教教我吗？
25.chineseTL: Commander, do you also know how to dance? Erm...could...could you teach me?
25.japanese: 指揮官はダンスも出来るの？ええと、その――私に踊り方を教えてくれないかな…？
25.japaneseTL: Do you know how to dance, Commander? Um, I wonder if you could teach me how to dance?

26.chinese: 指挥官，在比叡姐的宴会上，我能做你的舞伴吗？
26.chineseTL: Commander, can I be your dance partner at Hiei's banquet?
26.japanese: 指揮官、今度の比叡さんの宴会で、私にダンス相手を務めさせてもらえない……？
26.japaneseTL: Commander, the next time when Hiei hosts a party, would you be my dancing partner?

27.chinese: 有、有点害羞呢……现在，指挥官就是我最重要的人了……哎，和姐姐们比？那、那个，不一样的啦——
27.chineseTL: This is, slightly embarrassing...from now on, commander is the most important person in my life...Eh, what about my sisters? That, that is a different matter...
27.japanese: す、少し恥ずかしいね……これからは指揮官が私の一番大切な人……あ、姉と比べるとどうかって？そ、そんなの全然違う話でしょ？！
27.japaneseTL: Th-this is a little embarrassing. From now on you are my most important person. Ah, how important are you compared to my older sister? Th-that's a totally different story, isn't it?!

28.japanese: (金剛) 金剛姉さん、私は活躍できていますか！？
28.japaneseTL: (Kongou) Big sis Kongou, did I do well!?

29.chinese: (比叡)我会将眼前的一切，都干净利落地——击溃！
29.chineseTL: (Hiei) I will crush everything before me!
29.japanese: (比叡) 目の前の全てを……撃ち倒す！！
29.japaneseTL: (Hiei) Everything you see in front of us, shoot it down!!

30.chinese: (雾岛)好好欣赏姐姐的英勇身姿吧！
30.japanese: (霧島) 私の勇姿を見せてあげる！
30.japaneseTL: (Kirishima) I'll show you how dauntless I am!

31.chinese: (伊势, 日向)吴港分队——出击！
31.japanese: (伊勢, 日向) 呉配属戦艦隊、進めっ！

32.chinese: 指挥官，给你，巧克力。不过先说好，是比叡姐帮我做的，我试了好多次都失败了。没办法，只有这个我是真的不拿手……
32.japanese: 指揮官、ほら、チョコ。言っておくけど、これは私一人で作ったのではなく、比叡姉さんにも手伝ってもらったよ？…こういう手先の器用さが要る料理は私、やっぱり得意ではないから。

1.chinese: 偶尔转换心情，享受一下校园生活似乎也不错…嗯？指挥官也想一起听歌吗？耳机分你一半——
1.chineseTL: It's pretty nice to have a change of pace, and enjoy school life once in a while...Hmm? Commander also wants to listen? Here, take this piece.
1.japanese: たまには学園生活ってものを楽しんでもいい気がする…うん？自分も聞きたいって？いいよ。こっちの半分でよければ
1.japaneseTL: It's okay to enjoy school life once in a while. Hmm? You want to listen, too? Sure, I'll share with you.

2.chinese: 和霧島走在一起时，总会引起过多的关注…哈啊…受欢迎也不净是好事啊……
2.chineseTL: Walking together with Kirishima always attracts so too much attention...Sigh...I guess being popular is not always a good thing...
2.japanese: 霧島と一緒にこういう恰好で出歩くと余計見られるようになる気がする……はあ…人気者も大変ね……
2.japaneseTL: I feel like I'm also getting stared at next to Kirishima in this outfit. Haah, those who are popular sure have it tough.

3.chinese: 比起坐在教室里听课，我还是更喜欢在操场活动身体呢…
3.chineseTL: Instead of studying in class, I think I prefer exercising in the courtyard...
3.japanese: 教室で授業を受けるより、運動場で汗をかく方が好きかな
3.japaneseTL: Instead of studying in class, I think I prefer exercising and breaking a sweat.

4.chinese: 社团活动啊…空手道部之类的…怎么样？
4.chineseTL: Clubs huh...How about...ones like Karate club?
4.japanese: 部活は…空手部ってのは…どう？
4.japaneseTL: Club activities, how about Karate club?

5.chinese: 我这周有空哟，要不要一起去哪里逛逛呢，指挥官？
5.chineseTL: I'm free this week. Commander, want to go out somewhere?
5.japanese: 今週なら放課後は空いてるよ。指揮官、どっか行かない？
5.japaneseTL: I'm free this week after class. Commander, want to go out somewhere?

6.chinese: 比叡姐做的便当，每天都很让人期待呢
6.chineseTL: I enjoy having Hiei's homemade bento everyday.
6.japanese: 比叡さんが作ってくれた弁当が毎日の楽しみなんだ
6.japaneseTL: I enjoy having Hiei's homemade lunchbox everyday.

7.chineseTL: ...Do you want to be smacked by my bag?
7.japanese: …この鞄でぶん殴られたいの？
7.japaneseTL: ...Do you want me to hit you with my bag?

8.chinese: 唔…好像快迟到了…抓紧时间解决掉敌人吧！
8.chineseTL: Ah...I'm going to be late...We have to take care of the enemies quickly!
8.japanese: くっ…時間が…早く敵をやっつけるよ！
8.japaneseTL: Phew, look at the time. We have to take care of the enemies quickly!
